originalText.text: This school is very draining and stressful. The kids have no fun and they can’t show they’re creative side in the building. Most teachers treat us like we have no common sense and they don’t acknowledge our request. There are a handful of people in this building that changed my life and I’m so grateful that I’ve met them.

originalText.text: If I could give this school a zero I would, this school is horrible and I would never recommend, pass the 4th grade the kids are out of control and I feel as tho some teachers are very evil , in all I would not recommend this prison for your children I recommend any other school.

originalText.text: I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone I’m disappointed to say my son goes to this school. The line when picking up your child is disgusting and my son a third grader come home regularly without homework. This his last year with hcz

originalText.text: Starting from the 3 year old journey program, thanks to this school, my 14 year old son was accepted to study as an engineer in high school in a different state. All staff, teachers, program director etc are very dedicated to your child's learning. Thank you Jeffrey Canada for bringing such involved teaching and other programs to our community. Now my 3 old daughter has started preschool. What you put in is what you get. I've gotten so much and I will continue to send all my children to HCZ. My family and friends has trusted their dedication. PROUD PARENT OF 2 HCZ CHILDREN

originalText.text: idk about this school, well i do, my sibling is in 11th grade, and goes there, he is a after school worker in the school, and he is one of the best students in his grade to get a possibly good grade, he does play around and so, but still. oh and the inside. i think thats PRETTY COOOOOLLL, lol
